title: Publicity shot for Limehouse Blues
last_on_display_place: Australian Centre for the Moving Image
brief_description: : Chinese-American film star, Anna May Wong (1905 - 1961) wearing a dress with dragon motif in a publicity shot for ‘Limehouse Blues’, directed by Alexander Hall. (Photo via John Kobal Foundation/Getty Images)
